title: Hotel Check-in

stages.name: Arrival
stages.ai_opening: Good afternoon! Welcome to Grand Hotel. Do you have a reservation?
stages.learning_tip: 예약 확인할 때 'I have a reservation under...'
suggested_responses: Yes, I have a reservation under Kim.
Hi, checking in. Reservation number is 12345.
Yes, I booked through the website.

stages.name: Verification
stages.ai_prompt: Ask for ID and confirm reservation details
suggested_responses: I booked for two nights, is that correct?

stages.name: Room Information
stages.ai_prompt: Provide room details and hotel information
suggested_responses: What floor is my room on?

stages.name: Completion
stages.ai_prompt: Give room key and final information
stages.learning_tip: 체크아웃 시간 확인 'What time is checkout?'
suggested_responses: Can I leave my luggage after checkout?

completion_message: Great job completing the Hotel Check-in scenario!
